fields.Title: PLAZA ORB / col do ma ma daqua afterthought
fields.Description: Afterthought when Lena has told you about this cryptid.
fields.Placement:
Area: Plaza.
Details: This orb should appear right when you exit the Whirling after the condition is met.

fields.Title: START
input
Inland Empire: "There it is again! You are about to..."
fields.Dialogue Text: There it is again! You are about to re-discover a long-lost species!

fields.Title: Inland Empire: "Keep your ears peeled, then. If the..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Keep your ears peeled, then. If the species really has migrated to Martinaise, you're sure to hear it again.

fields.Title: Inland Empire: "Was that -- could it be -- the Col..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Was that -- could it be -- the Col Do Ma Ma Daqua?! No. It's probably just your *imagination* ringing in your ear...

fields.Title: You: "Probably not. [Discard thought.]"
fields.Dialogue Text: Probably not. [Discard thought.]

fields.Title: You: "Is it? Is there a ringing? (Listen..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Is it? Is there a ringing? (Listen more closely.)

fields.Title: the_main_stuff
Jump to: [the_main_stuff]
Variable["canal.roy_likes_recording_sounds"]
Variable["canal.roy_likes_recording_sounds"]
!(Variable["canal.roy_likes_recording_sounds"])
Inland Empire: "Of course he doesn't. He's DEAF."
fields.Dialogue Text: Of course he doesn't. He's DEAF.

fields.Title: IsTHCPresent("remote_viewer")
IsTHCPresent("remote_viewer")
!(IsTHCPresent("remote_viewer"))
Inland Empire: "So it does. It's gone. All that's l..."
fields.Dialogue Text: So it does. It's gone. All that's left for you -- is the disco.

fields.Title: Variable["canal.roy_necktie_altercation"]  and  CheckEquipped("neck_tie")  and  Variable["whirling.necktie_personified"]
Variable["canal.roy_necktie_altercation"]  and  CheckEquipped("neck_tie")  and  Variable["whirling.necktie_personified"]
!(Variable["canal.roy_necktie_altercation"]  and  CheckEquipped("neck_tie")  and  Variable["whirling.necktie_personified"])
You: "Listen closely first."
fields.Dialogue Text: Listen closely first.

fields.Title: col_do_ma_ma_hub
Composure: "Keep still! It might perch on your..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Keep still! It might perch on your shoulder.

fields.Title: Physical Instrument: "What are you doing? You're a police..."
fields.Dialogue Text: What are you doing? You're a police officer, not a pansy ornithologist. The only birds you should be looking for are healthy women of child-bearing age.

fields.Title: Reaction Speed: "That pawnbroker -- Roy -- was into..."
fields.Dialogue Text: That pawnbroker -- Roy -- was into natural sounds too. Maybe you could talk to him.

fields.Title: You: ""Wait, Kim, do *you* hear a high pi..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Wait, Kim, do *you* hear a high pitched noise?"

fields.Title: You: "Go then, leave! Leave like everythi..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Go then, leave! Leave like everything else! (Don't.)

fields.Title: Inland Empire: "There seems to be. An *extremely* h..."
fields.Dialogue Text: There seems to be. An *extremely* high pitched ring. Ultrasonic. Lena said it was very high-pitched, right? It's like something *tickles* your ear.

fields.Title: You: "Hold very still and hope the bird c..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Hold very still and hope the bird comes to perch on your shoulder. (Proceed.)

fields.Title: Variable["canal.roy_likes_recording_sounds"]
Variable["canal.roy_likes_recording_sounds"]
!(Variable["canal.roy_likes_recording_sounds"])
Inland Empire: "It must be very close... maybe, jus..."
fields.Dialogue Text: It must be very close... maybe, just maybe it will come toward you...

fields.Title: Electrochemistry: "Don't be a weirdo like that Roy at..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Don't be a weirdo like that Roy at the pawnshop who doesn't like music. You don't need *sounds* when you have beats.

fields.Title: Perception (Hearing): "Honestly, your ear isn't hearing a..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Honestly, your ear isn't hearing a whole lot. The distant hum of the industrial harbour. The traffic. But, admittedly -- there *is* a high pitched noise somewhere there too. But then, isn't there always...

fields.Title: Savoir Faire: "Yeah, but how are you going to catc..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Yeah, but how are you going to catch it?

fields.Title: Inland Empire: "Oh no! The sound -- it's moving awa..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Oh no! The sound -- it's moving away, somewhere over there -- go after it!

fields.Title: Horrific Necktie: "Remember that asshole Roy who wante..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Remember that asshole Roy who wanted you to take me off? He didn't like music, only sounds. What a loser. It's good you're not like him. You and disco will be together forever.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""No. I don't hear the Col Do Ma Ma..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "No. I don't hear the Col Do Ma Ma Daqua -- and neither do you."

fields.Title: Inland Empire: "But you're not a regular animal. Yo..."
fields.Dialogue Text: But you're not a regular animal. You're not even a regular cop. You see -- and hear! -- beyond the veil.

fields.Title: You: "Move your head toward the sound. (P..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Move your head toward the sound. (Proceed.)

fields.Title: Inland Empire: "No... Too late. It's gone... There..."
fields.Dialogue Text: No... Too late. It's gone... There is no ringing anymore. Just the sound of the streets.

fields.Title: Logic: "Lena also said that it couldn't be..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Lena also said that it couldn't be heard by any other animal -- including humans. What you're hearing must just be a regular bird.

fields.Title: You: "Keep listening."
fields.Dialogue Text: Keep listening.

fields.Title: You: "No, come back, please! (Listen more..."
fields.Dialogue Text: No, come back, please! (Listen more.)
